arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Cagliari – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Stadio Diego Armando Maradona forms the backdrop for an exciting Serie A round-two clash between Napoli and Cagliari. It caps off Saturday's schedule in Italy's elite division as Antonio Conte's men seek another win before going into September's international break. The post Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Cagliari – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.sum: Antonio Conte is expected to confirm the same Napoli XI that beat Sassuolo last week,...

arts.ttl: Napoli return to the Maradona to face Cagliari
arts.sum: 45 official matches between the two teams in Naples, with 28 wins for the Azzurri {the last one 2-0 in last year`s Serie A), 12 draws {the last one 1-1 in Serie A 2020/21) and five Sardinian victories {the last one 0-1 in Serie A 2019/20). Napoli head to the Maradona for the first time this season, and will be reunited with their fans against Cagliari.
